verses.verse: שָׁפְטֵ֤נִי <S%H8199><s%> Judge אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> me O God וְרִ֘יבָ֤ה <S%H7378><s%> and plead רִיבִ֗י <S%H7379><s%> my cause מִגּ֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not חָסִ֑יד <S%H2623><s%> godly מֵ֤אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man מִרְמָ֖ה <S%H4820><s%> me from the deceitful וְעַוְלָ֣ה <S%H5766><s%> and unjust תְפַלְּטֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6403><s%> O deliver

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <S%H859><s%> You אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> For thou [art] the God מָֽעוּזִּי֮ <S%H4581><s%> of my strength לָמָ֪ה <S%H4100><s%> why זְנַ֫חְתָּ֥נִי <S%H2186><s%> why dost thou cast me off לָֽמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why קֹדֵ֥ר <S%H6937><s%> I mourning אֶתְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ? why go בְּלַ֣חַץ <S%H3906><s%> because of the oppression אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> of the enemy

שְׁלַח־ <S%H7971><s%> O send out אוֹרְךָ֣ <S%H216><s%> thy light וַ֭אֲמִתְּךָ <S%H571><s%> and thy truth הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> them יַנְח֑וּנִי <S%H5148><s%> let them lead יְבִיא֥וּנִי <S%H935><s%> me let them bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַֽר־ <S%H2022><s%> hill קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <S%H6944><s%> me unto thy holy וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4908><s%> and to thy tabernacles

וְאָב֤וֹאָה ׀ <S%H935><s%> Then will I go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִזְבַּ֬ח <S%H4196><s%> unto the altar אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֵל֮ <S%H410><s%> unto God שִׂמְחַ֪ת <S%H8057><s%> my exceeding גִּ֫ילִ֥י <S%H1524><s%> joy וְאוֹדְךָ֥ <S%H3034><s%> will I praise בְכִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> yea upon the harp אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> thee O God אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> my God

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י ׀ <S%H7817><s%> Why art thou cast down נַפְשִׁי֮ <S%H5315><s%> any וּֽמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why תֶּהֱמִ֪י <S%H1993><s%> disturbed עָ֫לָ֥י <S%H5921><s%> within הוֹחִ֣ילִי <S%H3176><s%> within me? hope לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> in God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> shall again אוֹדֶ֑נּוּ <S%H3034><s%> for I shall yet praise יְשׁוּעֹ֥ת <S%H3444><s%> him [who is] the health פָּ֝נַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> of my countenance וֵֽאלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> and my God
